NgfDocumentCmWidgetCardGridV1.description: Cards displayed in a grid with title, subtitle, and image.
NgfDocumentCmWidgetCardGridV1.fullDescription: Cards in a grid with title, subtitle, and image, where each card is a link restricted to the mobalytics.gg domain.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetCardGridV2.description: Cards displayed in a grid with title, subtitle, and image.
NgfDocumentCmWidgetCardGridV2.fullDescription: Cards in a grid with title, subtitle, and image, where each card is a link restricted to the mobalytics.gg domain.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetCrossPageTabBarV1.fullDescription: The tab bar enables navigation and cross-linking between pages. It must be added separately to each page.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetDiscoveryPreviewCompa.description: Auto-updatable compact preview of documents e.g. Builds.
NgfDocumentCmWidgetDiscoveryPreviewCompa.fullDescription: Documents Preview Compact lists a specific type of documents (e.g. builds or guides), filtered and sorted by defined criteria.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetDiscoveryPreviewCompa.description: Auto-updatable compact preview of documents e.g. Builds.
NgfDocumentCmWidgetDiscoveryPreviewCompa.fullDescription: Documents Preview Compact lists a specific type of documents (e.g. builds or guides), filtered and sorted by defined criteria.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetDiscoveryPreviewV1.description: Auto-updatable preview of documents e.g. Builds.
NgfDocumentCmWidgetDiscoveryPreviewV1.fullDescription: Documents Preview lists a specific type of documents (e.g. builds or guides), filtered and sorted by defined criteria.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetDiscoveryPreviewV2.description: Auto-updatable preview of documents e.g. Builds.
NgfDocumentCmWidgetDiscoveryPreviewV2.fullDescription: Documents Preview lists a specific type of documents (e.g. builds or guides), filtered and sorted by defined criteria.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetDocumentsFeedV1.description: Auto-updatable feed of documents e.g. Builds.
NgfDocumentCmWidgetDocumentsFeedV1.fullDescription: Documents Feed lists a specific type of documents (e.g. builds or guides), filtered and sorted by defined criteria.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetDocumentsFeedV2.description: Auto-updatable feed of documents e.g. Builds.
NgfDocumentCmWidgetDocumentsFeedV2.fullDescription: Documents Feed lists a specific type of documents (e.g. builds or guides), filtered and sorted by defined criteria.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetGameDataCardGridV1.description: Card grid populated with game data entities.
NgfDocumentCmWidgetGameDataCardGridV1.fullDescription: Cards displayed as a grid, filled with game data entities like champions, heroes, weapons, skills, etc.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetGameDataCardGridV2.description: Card grid populated with game data entities.
NgfDocumentCmWidgetGameDataCardGridV2.fullDescription: Cards displayed as a grid, filled with game data entities like champions, heroes, weapons, skills, etc.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetGameDataTierListV1.description: Tier List of Game Data entities e.g. Champions
NgfDocumentCmWidgetGameDataTierListV1.fullDescription: Tier list of Game Data entities, such as Champions, Weapons, Skills, etc. To assign a tier, navigate to the Game Entity page and select a tier from the dropdown in the control bar.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetPromoBannerHorizontal.fullDescription: Customizable horizontal promo banner for different platforms and user types.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetPromoBannerNetboardV1.fullDescription: Customizable, large eye-catching promo banner for various platforms and user types.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetRichTextSimplifiedV1.description: Rich text formatting, and game data.
NgfDocumentCmWidgetRichTextSimplifiedV1.fullDescription: Text editor with formatting options: bold, italic, game data, and more.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetRichTextSimplifiedV2.description: Rich text formatting and game data.
NgfDocumentCmWidgetRichTextSimplifiedV2.fullDescription: Text editor with formatting options: bold, italic, colored text, headings, game data, and more.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetRichTextV1.description: Rich text formatting, images, videos, and game data.
NgfDocumentCmWidgetRichTextV1.fullDescription: Text editor with formatting options: bold, italic, colored text, headings, images, videos, game data, and more.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetRichTextV2.description: Rich text formatting, images, videos, and game data.
NgfDocumentCmWidgetRichTextV2.fullDescription: Text editor with formatting options: bold, italic, colored text, headings, images, videos, game data, and more.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetTableOfContentV1.description: Generate a table of contents for a document.
NgfDocumentCmWidgetTableOfContentV1.fullDescription: Automatically generate a table of contents for a document based on its content.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetUGTierListV1.description: Tier List of documents e.g. Builds.
NgfDocumentCmWidgetUGTierListV1.fullDescription: Tier list of documents, such as builds. To assign a tier, navigate to the document page and select a tier from the dropdown in the control bar.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetUGTierListV2.description: Tier List of documents e.g. Builds.
NgfDocumentCmWidgetUGTierListV2.fullDescription: Tier list of documents, such as builds. To assign a tier, navigate to the document page and select a tier from the dropdown in the control bar.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetVideoV1.description: Embed a video from a video hosting service.
NgfDocumentCmWidgetVideoV1.fullDescription: Embed a video from one of the supported video hosting services - YouTube, Vimeo, or Twitch.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetVideoV2.description: Embed a video from a video hosting service.
NgfDocumentCmWidgetVideoV2.fullDescription: Embed a video from one of the supported video hosting services - YouTube, Vimeo, or Twitch.

NgfDocumentStWidgetDocumentsDiscoveryV1.description: Discover documents of a certain type using filters.
NgfDocumentStWidgetDocumentsDiscoveryV1.fullDescription: Documents Discovery allows listing documents of a certain type (e.g. builds or guides) using various filters.

NgfDocumentStWidgetHeaderV1.description: Introduce users to the page content.
NgfDocumentStWidgetHeaderV1.fullDescription: Designed to introduce users to the page content, the widget uses its title as the <h1> tag for SEO value.

NgfDocumentStWidgetHeaderV2.description: Introduce users to the page content.
NgfDocumentStWidgetHeaderV2.fullDescription: Designed to introduce users to the page content, the widget uses its title as the <h1> tag for SEO value.

NgfDocumentStWidgetHomePageHeaderV1.description: Use on the Home Page to introduce users to a game.
NgfDocumentStWidgetHomePageHeaderV1.fullDescription: Designed for the Home Page to introduce users to a game, the widget uses the game name and title as the <h1> tag for SEO value.

NgfDocumentStWidgetHomePageHeaderV2.description: Use on the Home Page to introduce users to a game.
NgfDocumentStWidgetHomePageHeaderV2.fullDescription: Designed for the Home Page to introduce users to a game, the widget uses the game name and title as the <h1> tag for SEO value.

NgfDocumentStWidgetLinksGridManualV1.description: Cards gallery, adjustable for various screen sizes.
NgfDocumentStWidgetLinksGridManualV1.fullDescription: Cards displayed as a gallery, adjustable for various screen sizes. Widget layout auto-adjusts based on the number of cards.

NgfDocumentStWidgetLinksGridManualV2.description: Cards gallery, adjustable for various screen sizes.
NgfDocumentStWidgetLinksGridManualV2.fullDescription: Cards displayed as a gallery, adjustable for various screen sizes. Widget layout auto-adjusts based on the number of cards.

NgfDocumentUgWidgetHeaderV1.description: Universal page header for builds and guides.
NgfDocumentUgWidgetHeaderV1.fullDescription: Universal page header for builds and guides, the widget uses the game name, document type, and document name as the <h1> tag for SEO value.

NgfDocumentCmWidgetStrengthsAndWeaknesse.description: Strengths and weaknesses of a game entity.
NgfDocumentCmWidgetStrengthsAndWeaknesse.fullDescription: Strengths and weaknesses of a game entity, such as a champion, hero, weapon, skill, etc.
